creator: wisemaj2@ohio.edu
onealj@apache.org
text: Could you attach the file that causes the problem and include a full stack trace so we can reproduce this bug.

Also POI does currently not fully support overwriting the file that you still have open, it might work but also might be related here. Therefore please try to write to a different file and see if the error persists or goes away.
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
onealj@apache.org
text: In my POI-powered applications, I write to a temporary file, close the workbook, rename the original to "backup", then rename the temp to the original filename. If you don't want the backup file, delete it instead of renaming it.

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: No response on the requested information, thus there is currently nothing that we can take a close look on. For now please try to write to a different file first to see if that makes it work as POI does not support overwriting the source-file by design currently.
